channel.title: Front page on PoppyGo Book
channel.description: Recent content in Front page on PoppyGo Book

item.title: Site Workspace Configuration
item.description: Site workspace configuration # Every PoppyGo website has it own workspace configuration file. It’s located in $HOME/Sukoh/config.websitename.json. The workspace configurations tells PoppyGo where to find the site files and where to publish the website. Normally this configuration needs no manual modification. property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique name string mandatory The name of the website lastPublish integer mandatory Timespamp with time of last publication publishStatus integer mandatory 1=published, 2=publication pending remote source.

item.title: Accordion
item.description: Accordion # The accordion field is a container field. It can define multiple input fields, which are displayed as subform. The output is an array of dictionaries. Accordion Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the accordion element dynFormSearchKey string optional (default: null) key of one of the child field of which the value refers to a custom partial form dynFormObjectFile string with relative path to file without file extension optional (default: null) if dynFormSearchKey is set this path points to the file containing a subform.

item.title: Boolean
item.description: Boolean # The boolean field generates a switch. The output value is true or false Boolean Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element tip string optional (default: null) Text entered here with markdown formatting is displayed as context help in an overlay box default string optional (default: null) default value when the key is not set yet Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: boolean Output # sample_field: true Sample frontmatter output #

item.title: Bundle image thumbnail
item.description: Bundle image thumbnail # The bundle-image-thumbnail field renders a thumbnail image. It can only be used together with the bundle-manager field. Read bundle-manager documentation for more information. Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique Sample # Configuration # key: thumb type: bundle-image-thumbnail

item.title: Bundle manager
item.description: Bundle manager # The bundle-manager is a container field for creating a file-manager form for managing the assets of page bundles. The word page bundle refers to Hugo’s Page Bundles. A page bundle is a way of organizing a page inside it’s own directory together with it’s resources. It’s not possible to use Bundle managers with pages which are not stored as page bundle. Bundle Manager together with a Bundle Image Thumbnail Bundle Manager with Bundle Image Thumbnail and extra string fields Bundle image thumbnail # The bundle-image-thumbnail field is a special field to be used together with bundle-manager containers.

item.title: Chips
item.description: Chips # The chips field generates a field that helps creating tags of keywords from entered strings instantly. The output value is an array with strings. Chips Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element tip string optional (default: null) Text entered here with markdown formatting is displayed as context help in an overlay box default array of strings optional (default: null) default value when the key is not set yet Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: chips default: - one - two Output # sample_field: - one - three Known issues # When tip property is not working.

item.title: Date
item.description: Date # The date field generates a date field with a date picker. The output value is a date string. Date field Date picker popup Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element tip string optional (default: null) Text entered here with markdown formatting is displayed as context help in an overlay box default string optional (default: null) default value when the key is not set yet Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: date default: "2021-04-12" Output # sample_field: "2021-03-21"

item.title: Empty line
item.description: Empty line # The empty-line field is renders 1 or more empty lines in the form. It generates no output. empty line between title and description with amount: 2 Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique amount integer optional (default: 1) Amount of empty lines to draw Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field type: empty-line amount: 2

item.title: Hidden
item.description: Hidden # The hidden field is hidden for the user but outputs a default value. Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique default string mandatory default value when the key is not set yet Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field default: some value type: hidden Output # sample_field: some value

item.title: Info
item.description: Info # The info field is shows a readonly information box. It generates no output. Info field Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique content string mandatory The content of the box in Markdown formatted textent size enum of strings (normal, small, large) optional (default: normal) Fontsize of small is 85%, normal 100%, large 110% Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field type: info content: |-# Info This is a readonly info field.

item.title: Leaf array
item.description: Leaf array # The lead array field is a container field for a single child field. The output is a collection of values of the child field value type. Leaf array with dates f-arere Properties # Bundle manager Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique.

item.title: Markdown
item.description: String # The string field generates a field for entering strings. Multiline string values are allowed by enableing this property. Single markdown Multi line markdown Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element tip string optional (default: null) Text entered here with markdown formatting is displayed as context help in an overlay box default string optional (default: null) default value when the key is not set yet multiLine boolean optional (default: false) Enable multi line value preview boolean optional (default: false) Enable preview field with rendered HTML Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: string multiLine: true Output # sample_field: |-Some multiline string value Known issues # The preview field is broken.

item.title: Nest
item.description: Nest # The nest field is a container field. It can define multiple input fields, which are displayed as a subform. You have to focus the nest-field the show the sub form. The output is a dictionary with values from the sub form fields. nest unfocussed nest focussed Properties # Bundle manager Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique.

item.title: Number
item.description: Number # The number field generates a field for entering numbers. Both integers and floating numbers are allowed. It’s not possible to enter othert characters. Number Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element tip string optional (default null) Text entered here with markdown formatting is displayed as context help in an overlay box default string optional (default: null) default value when the key is not set yet Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: number Output # sample_field: 13.

item.title: Pull
item.description: Section # The pull field is a container field. It can define multiple input fields. The fields defined in a pull are displayed at the same level as other fields next to the pull field. The values are stored as dictionary below the pull key. Example use of the pull field. The fields author and Description are show at the same level as the Title field Properties # Bundle manager Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique.

item.title: Readonly
item.description: Readonly # The readonly field is shows a value but cannot be modified by the form user. The value can be a string or a number. Readonly Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element tip string optional (default null) Text entered here with markdown formatting is displayed as context help in an overlay box Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: readonly Output # sample_field: some value

item.title: Section
item.description: Section # The section field is a container field. It can define multiple input fields, which are displayed as a sub form. The output is a dictionary with values from the sub form fields. section Properties # Bundle manager Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique.

item.title: Select
item.description: Select # The select field generates a dropdown selectbox for selecting strings or numbers. The output is a number or string. If multiple is set true the out is an array of numbers or strings. Select field Select multiple field Select dropdown with options Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element tip string optional (default: null) Text entered here with markdown formatting is displayed as context help in an overlay box default string OR number OR array of strings optional (default: null) default value when the key is not set yet multiple boolean optional (default: false) Enable multiple selection options array of dictionaries mandatory Array with title/value pairs options.

item.title: String
item.description: String # The string field generates a field for entering strings. Multiline string values are allowed by enableing this property. Single line string Multi line string Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element tip string optional (default null) Text entered here with markdown formatting is displayed as context help in an overlay box default string optional (default: null) default value when the key is not set yet multiLine boolean optional (default false) Enable multi line value Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: string multiLine: true Output # sample_field: |-Some multiline string value
